segments.text: Steven , shall we go shopping tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum ... Why not go shopping the day after tomorrow ? Tomorrow is Saturday . I hate all the hustle and bustle of Saturday shopping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But Sunday is the same with Saturday . If you don ’ t mind , that's OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum.Maybe it will be better . The most important thing is that I can have a day to relax after a week's work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We will go the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , what kind of stores do we need to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy some clothes in clothing store . When we are going back , go to the butcher's shop and buy some chicken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s also go to the jewelry store to buy a crystal necklace . I want to buy one for you as your birthday present .
segments.speaker: S2
